column4: so is there any hope for gnome users in the future or should we just use natty until the end of time? heh
unity runs on top of gnome if that is what you ask
also can someone familiarize me (debian user) with the ubuntu bts, cause from my brief preview of 11.10 today I have a mile long list of bugs against various gnome components
yeah but I'm talking about people who know what a computer is and aren't mentally challenged and dont use unity
